name: Xolo Addon
author: xolosoftware

sections.description:
Xolo Addon gives you attractive Elementor widget to your websites. Its perfect test for Xolo Theme, But You can use for another theme also Astra, Sinatra and many more.

Available Widgets:

✅ Slider Widget
✅ Features Widget
✅ About Widget
✅ CEO Box Widget
✅ Funfact Widget
✅ Info Widget
✅ Service Widget
✅ Section Title Widget

License

Xolo Addon WordPress plugin, Copyright (C) 2024 Specia Theme
Xolo Addon WordPress plugin is licensed under the GPLv3 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html).
